name: Howmanyletters
0:
”Alexa open how many letters”
”Alexa play how many letters”
”Alexa start how many letters”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: how many letters
des:
An interactive game for players to improve their vocabulary and spellings in a fun way. 
Objective of the skill is to tell the number of letters in the word given by Alexa. 
Alexa will give the player a word, the payer has to quickly tell the number of letters in that word - ex: If alexa gives the word "school", the answer should be 6.
Get as many correct as you can in one go to get a big score and top the leader board. 
Become a champion by beating the best streak.

To start playing the game say Alexa, open how many letters.

Ask "what is my rank" to find out your rank
Ask "what is average" to find out your average score
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
